body:
Perverts: This is going to be good.

Me: Excuse me, but we're going to take our friend now.  Go get her Ash.

Ash: Thanks bro.  *runs to Misty* Misty.

Misty: *opens eyes* Ash! *hugs him*

Ash: Come on we're getting you out of here.

Misty: We?

Me: Hey Misty.

Misty: You brought your brother.

Me: Get Misty out of here.

Ash: What about you?

Me: I'm gonna play with my new friends. *cracks knuckles*

Ash: Have fun.

Pervert: No matter.  We still have the hard drive.

Me: You mean this hard drive. *holds the hard drive* *throws it at the wall*

Pervert: Why you.

Me: Now let me show you what happens when you mess with my friends. *starts beating them up*

*Later*

Me: I don't think those guys are gonna bother you anymore.

Perverts: *painful groans*

Misty: Thank you both.
The sequel to how to take care of the tomboy mermaid , this sequel is as good as the original but I like this one more because of ash present in the last page I can't wait until part 3 and 4
